title: Charlotte Trade Shows Boost Brand Visibility with Custom Tents
summary: Exhibitors in Charlotte, NC, are using custom canopy tents to enhance brand visibility and ROI at trade shows.
charlotte_impact: Highlights innovative marketing strategies for businesses in the Charlotte area, impacting local economic activity.

title: Mosaic Capital Partners Seeks Business Development VP
summary: Mosaic Capital Partners, a Charlotte-based private equity firm, is seeking a Vice President of Business Development.
charlotte_impact: Indicates growth and investment activity in the Charlotte financial sector, a key economic driver.

title: Florence Airport Passenger Numbers Rise Despite Flight Loss
summary: Florence Regional Airport saw increased passenger traffic in 2025, despite losing an American Airlines flight to Charlotte, NC.
charlotte_impact: Shows the fluctuating dynamics of regional air travel and its impact on local connectivity.

title: NC Women Charged in Torture and Death of Girl
summary: Three women in North Carolina are charged with the child abuse death of Dominique Moody, who was allegedly tortured and kept in a dog crate.
charlotte_impact: Addresses a severe case of child abuse, raising concerns about child welfare and safety in the community.

title: Homeowners Reassessing When to Sell Amid Market Shifts
summary: Homeowners are reassessing when to sell their homes as market conditions shift.
charlotte_impact: Reflects changing dynamics in the real estate market and its potential impact on homeowners.

title: KPN Facilitates $20M in Acquisitions, Expands Partnerships
summary: KPN Consulting Services facilitated $20M in acquisitions and expanded economic development partnerships.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates economic growth and investment in small businesses through consulting services.

title: Hepatic Artery Infusion Saves Gaston County Man's Life
summary: Rick Brooks' life was saved by hepatic artery infusion after being diagnosed with a rare cancer in the bile duct.
charlotte_impact: Highlights advancements in medical treatment and their impact on saving lives in the region.

title: Carolina Sports Medicine Center Opens New Facility
summary: Carolina Sports Medicine Center opens a new 20,000-square-foot facility, partnering with SLAY Basketball.
charlotte_impact: Expands access to elite training and care for youth and athletes, promoting health and wellness.

title: NC Senator Pushes for State Budget After Trump Comments
summary: North Carolina is currently the only state running without a state budget, prompting calls for action.
charlotte_impact: Addresses the importance of state budget approval for funding essential services and programs.

title: Fatal House Fires in NC Linked to Lack of Smoke Alarms
summary: Most fatal house fires in North Carolina in 2025 were preventable due to a lack of working smoke alarms.
charlotte_impact: Emphasizes the critical role of smoke alarms in preventing fatalities and promoting fire safety.

title: CATS Bus Collides with Car in Uptown Charlotte
summary: A CATS bus collided with a car in Uptown Charlotte, and five people are being evaluated for injuries.
charlotte_impact: Reports on a traffic incident involving public transportation, raising concerns about safety.

title: Lawsuit Filed Against DHS, Border Patrol for Alleged Unlawful Arrests
summary: Five people sue DHS and Border Patrol for alleged unlawful arrests in North Carolina.
charlotte_impact: Addresses concerns about civil rights and law enforcement practices in the region.

title: Concord Mom Speaks Out After Child Burned at Day Care
summary: A Concord mom speaks out after her 3-year-old daughter was burned by a teacher at day care.
charlotte_impact: Raises concerns about child safety and accountability in daycare facilities.

title: Iredell Sheriff Introduces New Narcotics Detection K-9
summary: Iredell sheriff introduces K-9 Waldo, trained to search for narcotics, missing people, and concealed evidence.
charlotte_impact: Highlights law enforcement efforts to combat drug-related crime and assist in search operations.

title: CMPD Trains New Explosives Detection K-9
